mapper.select: select s.name,t1.no,s.grade, c.name as className, t1.score1 as score2,t2.score2 as score1 from (select no,sum(score) as score1 from testerSoure where module in ('knowl','socialWork','competition', 'honorary') GROUP BY no) t1 join (select no, sum(score) as score2 from testerSoure where module in ('politics','ideology','morality', 'organ', 'law','learning','development','scientific','physical','mental') GROUP BY no) t2 on t1.no = t2.no join student s on t1.no = s.no join classes c on c.id=s.classid where s.grade = 19 or s.grade = 20
